text:
That's my last choice but in that case I need to fetch all blog posts. Can be more than 250, can not be good for performance.

I want to get all the months and years where blog posts have been published to be able to link to their date archive.
Example:
<http://myblog.com/archive/2019|myblog.com/archive/2019>
<http://myblog.com/archive/2019/02|myblog.com/archive/2019/02>
